content.question: Which of the following is most likely to benefit from unexpected inflation?

choices.label: A borrower paying fixed interest payments on debt
A lender collecting fixed interest payments on loans
A retiree with a fixed income
A saver who owns a certificate of deposit

content.answer: A borrower paying fixed interest payments on debt
